name: zrh1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(c1, nat1), c2), wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(c1, nat1), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, nat1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(c1, nat1), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)))
-| wi(wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, nat1), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(czrh, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(c1, nat1), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, nat1), c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(czrh, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)), wceq(cfv(c1, nat1), c2))
-| wceq(nat1, cfv(cur, zring))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cur, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(c1, nat1), c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(czrh, c0))
-| wceq(nat1, cfv(cur, zring))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cur, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring →(c1 ` 1)= c2)
⊣ c1 =(ZRHom ` c0)
⊣ 1 =(1r ` ZZring)
⊣ c2 =(1r ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(c1, nat1), c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(czrh, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cur, c0))

comment: Interpretation of 1 in a ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Sep-2015.)
